# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_HEADING

## Summary
Sets the entity's heading in degrees

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **FLOAT** newHeading

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set the heading of an entity in degrees also known as "Yaw".
